description:
The default value of monkey_patch_modules has not kept up with the move of notifier to openstack.common

It should now be  nova.compute.api:nova.openstack.common.notifier.api.notify_decorator
title: Default value of monkey_patch_modules is broken

comments.content:
The default value of monkey_patch_modules has not kept up with the move of notifier to openstack.common

It should now be  nova.compute.api:nova.openstack.common.notifier.api.notify_decorator
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~philip-day
